subject: Horse Racing
Kentucky Derby
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Rain
lead_paragraph: In that benign break in Saturday’s weather, the trainer Todd Pletcher finally won the Kentucky Derby after going 0 for 24, with Calvin Borel taking Super Saver home.
snippet: In that benign break in Saturday’s weather, the trainer Todd Pletcher finally won the Kentucky Derby after going 0 for 24, with Calvin Borel taking Super Saver home.
